attributes.comment:
This is a COMPLAINT about the fee increase for adoptive parents on the I600A.
The adoption wait has grown longer than the 18 months that the form is valid
forcing us to file a second time at an even higher expense. It is very frustrating
that the wait is so long, it is more frustating tht we have to file a new I600A and
submit more fingerprints, and it is most frustating that you are raising the FEE!

I do not understand the reason for the "18 month life" of the I600A for adoptive
parents. I do not understand why an extention can not be filed when we are
obviously still waiting for the baby which is the whole purpose for us obtaining the
I600A in the first place.

Please do not raise the already high fees.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Adoptive Parent, Amy Clark
